items.title: Water Maintenance Scheduled
items.description: Water will be shut off from 9am-12pm for routine maintenance of the east wing plumbing system. Please ensure you have stored enough water for essential needs during this period.

items.title: Summer Barbecue
items.description: Join us for our annual summer barbecue on the rooftop terrace. BYO drinks, food provided. Great opportunity to meet your neighbours and enjoy the Auckland summer weather.

items.title: New Pool Hours for Summer
items.description: The community pool will now be open from 6am to 10pm daily throughout the summer months. Please remember to shower before entering and supervise children at all times.

items.title: Fire Alarm Testing
items.description: Building fire alarm system will be tested between 10am and 11am. Please do not be alarmed by the sound. No evacuation required.

items.title: Yoga in the Garden
items.description: Morning yoga session led by resident instructor Sarah. All levels welcome. Bring your own mat or use one of ours. A great way to start your weekend!

items.title: Monthly Residents Meeting
items.description: Monthly committee meeting to discuss community matters including upcoming maintenance, budget review, and resident feedback. All residents welcome to attend.

items.title: Elevator Upgrade Notice
items.description: The west tower elevator will be out of service for modernization work. Please use the east tower elevator or stairs. We apologize for any inconvenience.

items.title: Garden Committee Volunteers Needed
items.description: We're looking for volunteers to help maintain our beautiful community gardens. No experience necessary - just enthusiasm! Contact the committee to sign up.

items.title: Movie Night: Classic Film
items.description: Join us in the common room for a screening of a classic film. Popcorn and refreshments provided. Family friendly event.

items.title: Parking Bay Restriping
items.description: The visitor parking area will be restriped this weekend. Please avoid parking in visitor spaces during this time.

items.title: Kids Craft Workshop
items.description: Free craft workshop for children aged 5-12. All materials provided. Parents must supervise children under 8.

items.title: Updated Body Corporate Rules
items.description: The updated body corporate rules are now available on the resident portal. Key changes include new quiet hours and pet policies. Please review at your convenience.

items.title: Gym Equipment Maintenance
items.description: Several gym machines will be serviced. The gym will remain open but some equipment may be temporarily unavailable.

items.title: Book Club Meeting
items.description: Monthly book club gathering to discuss this month's read: 'The Luminaries' by Eleanor Catton. New members always welcome!

items.title: Auckland Anniversary Day
items.description: Building office will be closed for Auckland Anniversary Day. Emergency maintenance line remains available 24/7.
